risk: Cloud platform mismatch - National Mutual uses AWS while buyer (Atlantic International) is Azure-primary
trigger: Integration strategy requires platform consolidation to buyer's Azure environment
impact_description: Cross-cloud migration required for AWS workloads, increased complexity, potential application re-architecture, extended timeline
cost_impact_estimate: $500K-$1.5M for cloud migration services plus 20-40% premium on migration effort
mitigation: Evaluate workloads for lift-and-shift vs re-architecture, consider multi-cloud strategy for critical applications, negotiate extended timeline

risk: Geographic concentration risk - both data centers in Chicago creates single region failure point
trigger: Regional disaster, network outage, or facility issues affecting Chicago area
impact_description: Business continuity risk despite 1-hour RPO/RTO targets, potential regulatory compliance issues for insurance company
cost_impact_estimate: Business interruption costs could exceed $1M+ per day for insurance operations
mitigation: Leverage buyer's geographically distributed DC footprint (Chicago, Phoenix, Atlanta, New York) for improved DR strategy

risk: On-premises Guidewire PolicyCenter and Duck Creek Claims systems require complex migration
trigger: Integration timeline pressure combined with business-critical nature of these systems
impact_description: Extended downtime during migration could halt policy issuance and claims processing, regulatory compliance issues, customer impact
cost_impact_estimate: $1M-$3M for specialized migration services plus potential business interruption costs
mitigation: Engage Guidewire/Duck Creek professional services, plan phased migration with extensive testing, consider parallel run strategy

risk: Potential end-of-life operating systems supporting legacy application versions
trigger: Security vulnerabilities or compliance requirements forcing immediate OS upgrades
impact_description: Security exposure, compliance violations, forced emergency upgrades during integration
cost_impact_estimate: $200K-$600K for emergency OS upgrades and application compatibility testing
mitigation: Immediate OS assessment, prioritize application upgrades, include OS remediation in integration timeline

risk: IP address space conflict between National Mutual and Atlantic International networks
trigger: Both companies likely use common RFC1918 ranges (10.x.x.x) for enterprise networks
impact_description: Prevents Day 1 network connectivity, blocks application access, requires IP renumbering project
mitigation: Immediate IP address scheme discovery, plan IP renumbering for smaller network, implement NAT as temporary solution

risk: Network connectivity disruption during data center consolidation
trigger: Atlantic International has 4 data centers vs National Mutual's 2, requiring network architecture changes
impact_description: Business disruption during migration, potential downtime for critical applications
mitigation: Detailed network migration planning, maintain redundant connectivity during transition, phased approach

risk: DNS namespace conflicts and resolution issues
trigger: Both companies likely have internal DNS domains that may conflict during integration
impact_description: Application connectivity issues, email delivery problems, authentication failures
mitigation: DNS architecture assessment, plan namespace consolidation or split-brain DNS configuration

risk: Identity provider fragmentation and integration complexity
trigger: National Mutual uses Microsoft Entra ID while buyer Atlantic International likely uses different identity systems, creating integration challenges
impact_description: Complex identity integration, potential security gaps during migration, user access disruption, and extended timeline for full integration
mitigation: Conduct detailed identity architecture assessment, plan phased migration approach, implement identity federation during transition period

risk: Legacy SIEM platform creates security monitoring gaps
trigger: National Mutual uses IBM QRadar while buyer uses Microsoft Sentinel, requiring SIEM migration and potential monitoring gaps during transition
impact_description: Reduced threat detection capability during migration, loss of historical security data, need to rebuild detection rules and playbooks
mitigation: Plan parallel SIEM operation during transition, migrate critical detection rules first, ensure 24/7 SOC coverage throughout migration

risk: Endpoint protection platform mismatch creates security gaps
trigger: National Mutual uses CrowdStrike while buyer uses Carbon Black, requiring endpoint agent migration across 1,800+ endpoints
impact_description: Temporary endpoint protection gaps during agent migration, potential malware exposure, user productivity impact from agent changes
mitigation: Maintain CrowdStrike during integration period, plan phased Carbon Black deployment, ensure no gaps in endpoint coverage

risk: Privileged access management gaps with CyberArk on-premises deployment
trigger: National Mutual has CyberArk PAM 13.2 on-premises while buyer likely uses cloud-based PAM, creating integration challenges and potential privileged access gaps
impact_description: Privileged account security gaps during migration, potential for unauthorized admin access, compliance violations
mitigation: Maintain existing CyberArk during transition, implement cloud PAM migration plan, ensure privileged account inventory and access reviews

trigger: National Mutual uses both Proofpoint and Mimecast for email security while buyer uses Mimecast, requiring consolidation and potential security gaps
impact_description: Email security gaps during migration, potential phishing exposure, configuration complexity with dual platforms
mitigation: Standardize on Mimecast platform, migrate Proofpoint configurations, maintain email security coverage during transition

risk: Critical path dependency risk - Network discovery delays blocking infrastructure migration
trigger: Network discovery takes longer than planned or reveals complex IP conflicts requiring extensive remediation
impact_description: Could delay entire integration timeline by 2-3 months if network issues aren't resolved before infrastructure migration begins
cost_impact_estimate: $500K-$1M in extended TSA costs and delayed synergies
mitigation: Start network discovery immediately upon LOI signing, engage specialized network consultants, develop parallel remediation plans

trigger: Azure AD integration with National Mutual's fragmented identity systems takes longer than expected
impact_description: All application migrations depend on identity integration - delays cascade across all domains and could extend timeline by 4-6 months
cost_impact_estimate: $1M-$2M in extended costs and delayed synergies
mitigation: Prioritize identity assessment and integration planning, consider federated identity as interim solution, engage Microsoft FastTrack services

risk: Security monitoring gap during SIEM migration
trigger: QRadar to Sentinel migration creates temporary blind spots in security monitoring during critical infrastructure changes
impact_description: Reduced security visibility during high-risk migration period could lead to undetected incidents or compliance violations
cost_impact_estimate: $200K-$500K for parallel SIEM operations plus potential incident costs
mitigation: Run parallel SIEM platforms during migration, implement enhanced monitoring during critical migration phases, accelerate security team cross-training
